title: Storm's Andulka
content:
The Storm Type Foundry has released Andulka, an "all weather" typeface.   
   
 [http://www.stormtype.com/andulka.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022125517/http:/www.stormtype.com/andulka.html)
author: addison

comments.content:
FYI: I've posted a review of Andulka on the Design Weblog.
